rootCause: Docs automation expected the justfile to call the sugarkube CLI without whitespace inside moustache placeholders, but the start-here and docs verify recipes still used the older spaced form, so the detection guard in tests/test_docs_verify_wrapper.py and tests/test_start_here_command.py failed.
resolution: Normalized the CLI recipes to use "{{sugarkube_cli}}" and tightened argument placeholders so START_HERE_ARGS and other forwards stay visible to the guard tests.
